hasLocked
hasRevealed
getAddress
getRevealed
getHash

nodes.documentation:
@notice This function returns the winner of the last game.
@return The player's numbe - either 1 or 2 (or 0 if it was a draw).
nodes.name: getWinner

nodes.documentation: @notice This function is called to reset the contract's variable states for a new game.
nodes.name: resetVariables

nodes.documentation:
@notice This function registers a player address to the game.
@param playerNumber The player's number (either 1 or 2).
nodes.name: registerPlayer
lockShape
revealShape
computeWinner

nodes.documentation: @notice This function is called when both players have locked and revealed their shapes and the 'Distribute Rewards' button in the UI is pressed.

stringsEqual

attributes.name: RockPaperScissors
hasLocked
hasRevealed
getAddress
getRevealed
getHash

attributes.documentation:
@notice This function returns the winner of the last game.
@return The player's numbe - either 1 or 2 (or 0 if it was a draw).
attributes.name: getWinner

attributes.documentation: @notice This function is called to reset the contract's variable states for a new game.
attributes.name: resetVariables

attributes.documentation:
@notice This function registers a player address to the game.
@param playerNumber The player's number (either 1 or 2).
attributes.name: registerPlayer
lockShape
revealShape
computeWinner

attributes.documentation: @notice This function is called when both players have locked and revealed their shapes and the 'Distribute Rewards' button in the UI is pressed.
attributes.name: distributeRewards
stringsEqual

computeWinner(string,string).return: 1, 2 or 0 depending on which player won the game (0 in the case of a draw).

getWinner().return: The player's numbe - either 1 or 2 (or 0 if it was a draw).

params.randomStringToHash: The player's selected random string to hash the shape with.
The player's selected random string to hash the shape with.

stringsEqual(string,string).return: true or false depending on whether the two strings are equal.

computeWinner(string,string).notice: This function computes the winner shape from two shapes and returns 1 if player 1 wins, 2 if player 2 wins and 0 if it is a draw.

distributeRewards().notice: This function is called when both players have locked and revealed their shapes and the 'Distribute Rewards' button in the UI is pressed.

getAddress(int256).notice: This function returns the corresponding player's address.

getHash(int256).notice: This function returns the corresponding player's hash.

getRevealed(int256).notice: This function returns the corresponding player's revealed string.

getWinner().notice: This function returns the winner of the last game.

hasLocked(int256).notice: This function returns a boolean whether the corresponding player has locked their shape.

hasRevealed(int256).notice: This function returns a boolean whether the corresponding player has revealed their shape.

lockShape(int256,string,string).notice: This function locks a player's shape by creating a hash of the passed in shape and string XORed.

registerPlayer(int256).notice: This function registers a player address to the game.

resetVariables().notice: This function is called to reset the contract's variable states for a new game.

revealShape(int256,string,string).notice: This function reveals a player's shape. This checks whether the stored hash equals the new given hash (consisting of the currently selected shape and string)

stringsEqual(string,string).notice: This function compares two strings (memory) and checks whether these are equal and returns the corresponding boolean.

userdoc.notice: This smart contract allows two players to play Rock Paper Scissors against each other and the winner gets some Ether as reward.
